attributes.name: options
attributes.desc: data of the options，the key of `value` and `label` can be customize by `Props`.

attributes.name: props
attributes.desc: configuration options, see the following table.

slots.desc: the custom content of cascader node, the parameter is { node, data }, which are current Node object and node data respectively.

events.name: @change
events.desc: triggers when the binding value changes

events.name: @expand-change
events.param: an array of the expanding node's parent nodes

methods.name: getCheckedNodes
methods.desc: get an array of currently selected node
methods.param: (leafOnly) whether only return the leaf checked nodes, default is `false`
